author: yetkinyilmaz
body:
In order to keep all genparticles from both signal and background part of the mixed PbPb event, one should not remake the genparticles in the DIGI step.

The second commit is in order to produce the MergedTrackingTruth in the case of pdigi_valid_nogen. The name of the sequence suggests that this should have been the expected behavior.

Need this PR for the DIGI campaign for HI MC production in the next days.
title: running pdigi_valid_nogen for HI mixing workflows
